original: @#/_/'jigs byed nag po chen🔽po'i sgrub thabs/ /rgya gar skad du/_bye ra ba ma ha ka la sa d+ha nam/_bod skad du/
analyzed: @#/_/'jigs byed nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/ /rgya gar skad du/_bye ra ba ma ha ka la sa d+ha nam/_bod skad du/
translated: The Sādhana of Mahākāla🔽The Sādhana of Mahākāla

original: 'jigs byed nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/_rje btshun nag po chen po la phyag
analyzed: 'jigs byed nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/_rje btshun nag po chen po la phyag
translated: Homage to the Lord Mahākāla!🔽The hero who has conquered the four māras,

original: 'tshhal lo/_/dpa' bo bdud bzhi las rgyal ba/_/gdul dka' ma lus 'dul
analyzed: 'tshhal lo/_/dpa' bo bdud bzhi las rgyal ba/_/gdul dka' ma lus 'dul
translated: the subduer of all the unruly ones,🔽surrounded by a host of mātṛkās,

original: ba po/_/ma mo'i tshhogs kyi kun nas bskor/_/'byung po ro langs tshhogs btud
analyzed: ba po/_/ma mo'i tshhogs kyi kun nas bskor/_/'byung po ro langs tshhogs btud
translated: having bowed to the hosts of bhūtas and vetālas,🔽I will explain his sādhana.

original: nas/_/de nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad par bya'o/_/dpa' bo'i g.yul gyi
analyzed: nas/_/de nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad par bya'o/_/dpa' bo'i g.yul gyi
translated: In a hero’s battlefield🔽or in a charnel ground,

original: sa'am/_dur khrod kyi gnas su/_ro'i stan la nye bar 'dug nas/_snying
analyzed: sa'am/_dur khrod kyi gnas su/_ro'i stan la nye bar 'dug nas/_snying
translated: sitting on a corpse seat,🔽having summoned Mahākāla with the light of the seed syllable located in the lotus of the heart,

original: kha'i pad+ma la gnas pa'i sa bon gyi 'od kyi nag po chen po bkug nas mchod par
analyzed: kha'i pad+ma la gnas pa'i sa bon gyi 'od kyi nag po chen po bkug nas mchod par
translated: having made offerings,🔽later one should absorb him into oneself.

analyzed: byas te/_phyis rang nyid la bsdu'o/_/de nas ni stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o/_/
translated: Then one should meditate on emptiness.

original: phyis ni rdo rje'i gur gyi dbus su/_bdag nyid nyi ma la hum mig sman ltar gnag
analyzed: phyis ni rdo rje'i gur gyi dbus su/_bdag nyid nyi ma la hum mig sman ltar gnag
translated: one should imagine oneself as the sun, with a hūṃ as dark as collyrium.

analyzed: pa bsam par bya'o/_/de las nag po chen po dbyar gyi char sprin dang mun pa
translated: From that, one should imagine oneself as Mahākāla, dark like a monsoon cloud or darkness,🔽with yellow hair bristling upward, a terrifying gaping mouth,

original: ltar gnag pa/_skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa/_mi bzad pa'i zhal gdangs
analyzed: ltar gnag pa/_skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa/_mi bzad pa'i zhal gdangs

original: 'jigs byed nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs
analyzed: 'jigs byed nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs

analyzed: shing mche ba gtshigs pa/_zhal nas khrag 'dzag pa/_gtum zhing rab tu
translated: Blood drips from his mouth, he is fierce and extremely

original: 'khros pa/_byis pa'i lus can/_sbom thung sus pa 'phyang ba/_mi'u thung /
analyzed: 'khros pa/_byis pa'i lus can/_sbom thung sus pa 'phyang ba/_mi'u thung /
translated: wrathful, with the body of a child, fat, short, with hanging breasts, and a goiter.🔽He has the five symbolic ornaments and is adorned with ugly ornaments.

original: phyag rgya lnga dang /_mi sdug pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/_dang po'i phyag gnyis kyi rdo🔽rje gri gug dang /_mgo bo'i thod pa khrag dang bcas pa bsnams pa/_lhag ma

analyzed: g.yas pa'i phyag gi ni/_ral gri dang mdung rtshe gsum pa bsnams pa/_g.yas

analyzed: brkyang ba'i stabs kyi rab bong gi gdan la 'dug pa/_khrag 'dzag pa'i mi mgo

analyzed: mtha'i me dang mnyam pa'i 'od/_'byung po'i tshhogs kyi mchog tu brjed par byed
translated: a tiger-skin skirt, and the radiance equal to the fire at the end of the eon.🔽He is the one to be remembered as the supreme of all the hosts of bhūtas.

analyzed: pa/_de nyid kyi dpral bar ni thig le'o/_/mgrin par ni rnam par bcad

analyzed: pa'o/_/snying gar ni hum yig go/_/dur khrod kyi gnas thams cad nas
translated: and at his heart a syllable hūṃ.

analyzed: 'jigs byed chen po 'khor dang bcas pa bkug ste bdag nyid la stim par bya ste/
translated: Having summoned the great Bhairava and his retinue from all the charnel grounds, they are absorbed into oneself.

analyzed: g.yon dang g.yas kyi dpung pa gnyis dang lag pa gnyis dang /_brla gnyis

analyzed: gtum po khros pa/_yid myos/_thod pa can/_'jigs rung /_spro byed ste/

analyzed: 'jigs byed brgyad po ni rol pa'i stabs kyis gnas pa nus ma rnams la yang

analyzed: zhing skyong dang /_tshhogs kyi bdag po rnams ral gri dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/_/

analyzed: gyur na/_sngags bzla bar bya ste/_hum ma ha ka la ya na mo hum phatah'bum phrag

analyzed: chen po nyid mngon du 'ong ngo /_/der ni 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ngo /_//

analyzed: 'jigs par mi bya ste/_khrag chen po dang myos byed kyi arga dbul bar bya'o/_/

translated: Offer the torma. Here, if you make offerings of alcohol,🔽a libation of great blood, a torma of various meats, and a continuous

analyzed: bdug pa rgyun mi chad par mchod par byed na de la ma ha ka la dgyes so/_/de

analyzed: nas ni sngags bzla bar bya zhing phyis nas mchod nas sin+ti prad ma he sha na ka li ka pra bra bal+la b+he/

analyzed: gal te slob ma kha cig la byin gyis brlab par 'dod na/_lha'i drangs
translated: If you wish to perform the consecration for some disciples,🔽in the skull cup of the deity, mix water with great blood and alcohol. With

analyzed: nyid kyi thod par khrag chen po dang myos byed bsres pa'i chu rang gi sngags kyis

analyzed: de nas lha thams cad kyis sngags kyi chus dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/slob ma nag po

analyzed: chen po lus kyi lha'i tshhogs dang bcas par 'dug pa la sngags kyi bsngags pa'i

analyzed: cod pan dang /_mtshhon cha dang /_rgyan dang /_stan rnams sbyin nas/_phyis gsang

analyzed: sngags kyang sbyin nas bzlas par bya'o/_/de la slar yang chus dbang bskur nas/

analyzed: gtor ma la sogs pa thams cad kyi mchod par byas nas 'dis ni bya ba thams

translated: Then the disciple should also offer a gift and the master should perform all the purifications.🔽This is the ritual of consecration.

original: ga'o/_/ma yig gis ni sgyu 'phrul che/_/ha yig 'di la gzhom med pa/_/ka yig rgyu
